alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Koochiching County through 130 AM CDT... At 1253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Birchdale, or 36 miles west of International Falls, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manitou around 100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Big Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Minnesota.
